name: Saunderson
review: Excellent adventure flying with Istvan. Before flying he determined my prior experience, and described what we would be doing. Then in the air before a maneuver he would tell me what we were about to do. He was very attentive to how I was reacting during the trip. We did a lot of what you see the Blue Angels do.

name: Doria
review: Thank you to MiGFlug for their professional and friendly service that allowed me to fly in a L-39 Albatros jet in Paderborn, Germany. I cannot speak highly enough of the pilot and ground crew. The experience was amazing and the realisation of a long held ambition. Thank you to all involved and looking forward to my next trip.

name: Maxy
review: Istvan was our AMAZING pilot in Chino, CA. My boyfriend is a private pilot and it was his bucket list to take a flight in a Mig... Mission accomplished!!!!! Istvan (Steve) was such a pleasure and SUPER good at what he does. He had the time of his life. THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU ISTVAN AND KRISTI FROM MIGFLUG :)

name: Moritz
review: Great experience! I’m a retired air traffic controller and I have a pilot’s license, so I have the background to evaluate the whole flight experience. It was very well organized, professional and, most importantly, a lot of fun.

name: Deloria
review: One of the best experiences of my life. I once had the honor of sitting in the nose bubble while landing the Yankee Lady and this flight was even more exciting.

name: Loella
review: The MiG flight exceeded our expectations in every way! The pilot was incredibly welcoming and knowledgable, and the flight was truly a once in a lifetime experience.
